short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the buttons in Arda learning portal. This extension is not affiliated with Arda.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the Arda learning portal?
This extension allows you to finish the modules faster by auto clicking the buttons. 

When you're on the Arda portal website. Turn on the extension by clicking the icon and it will start clicking the buttons.
